name: Noboru Cushion Cover - Grey Blue/Onyx
description: Sue's collection is inspired by the unique patterns found on the robes of the Japanese Ainu people. Multiple techniques have been used in the range, including applique and different styles of embroidery and stitching. The rich colour palette features saffron, grey/blue and charcoal, with hints of loganberry and flax. All of the cushions have a fine linen base, making the Arashi Collection as tactile as it is bold.
